room_title: Escape room "Fatal Attraction" by Cracked Norman in Oklahoma City
review: We did the Fatal Attraction room which was a challenge but was so much fun. The staff was great. My parents and I had a wonderful time!

room_title: Escape room "Fatal Attraction" by Cracked Norman in Oklahoma City
review: I took five 12-13 year old girls to do Fatal Attraction. I really liked the way there was more of a theme to the room and puzzles instead of just a series of random puzzles you find in some escape rooms. We got out with 25 minutes remaining and all of the girls had a blast!

room_title: Escape room "Fatal Attraction" by Cracked Norman in Oklahoma City
review: We took my dad for Father's Day to Fatal Attraction and thoroughly enjoyed it! It was so much fun! It's a great way to work as a team! I love that it's narrative based. Would highly recommend this room! Can't wait to go back for another one!
